titles.title: Jesus, Thy head, once crown’d with thorns

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou glorious light of courts above, Joy of the saints below, To us still manifest Thy love, That we its depths may know.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who suffer with Thee, Lord, today, Shall also with Thee reign: Then let it be our joy to pay The Price, this goal attain.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
